page.title: 14YOUTH CULTURE IN JARROW
page.content: I am a skinhead.I have my hair cut very short.I like my hair to be very short because it is neat and tidy.I've got tattoos on my arms and hands.I listen to music by The Toy Dolls,and Angelic Upstarts.My best friend, Sean, influenced me to dress in rolled up trousers and boots called Docs.I don't dress this way to frighten people.Most of my friends dress the same.People stare and think we're going to cause trouble.My family and girlfriend don't mind the way I dress.I used to work in the Community Industry,which was painting and decorating,but now I'm on the dole like many other people.I try to avoid fights if pssible,the people I fight with mainly are Mods and Posers.I have dressed this way for a long time,and wo'nt dress any other way.TERRANCE HUGHES(age17)
